title: Kowaremono: Risa The Animation
synopsis: Risa runs away from her home, and her uncle's house is the only place she can go to. The uncle has been lonely for a long time, and can't help but notice how much his niece has developed...
related_anime: ['Kowaremono:Risa', 'Kowaremono: Risa Plus The Animation', 'Kowaremono The Animation']
